meanings.definition: A photograph or image taken with a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The science book had colorful micrographs of tiny cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use micrographs to study bacteria and viruses.
meanings.sent3: The microscope took a selfie with its micrographs.
meanings.sent4: The micrographs were like windows into the microscopic world.
meanings.sent5: The micrographs revealed intricate details invisible to the naked eye.

meanings.sent1: The artist displayed beautiful micrographs of flowers at the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The detective examined the micrographs for clues to solve the case.
meanings.sent3: The micrographs had a tiny party in the photo album.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were captured in the micrographs of her childhood.
meanings.sent5: The micrographs were like miniature windows to the past.
